page.title: 05Lifestyles in Strensall
page.content: For our information on Lifestyles we have interviewed people of different ages and found that most people like Pop Music, and WHAM! is the favourite group.{Leisure time}is spent visiting friends, gardening or doing odd jobs around the house. When people{go out {for a meal}they prefer to go to a restaurant. The most popular starter for adults was prawn cocktail, the main course, steak or chicken, and sweet, fruit salad or gateaux. Childrens favourite meal was fish and chips and ice cream. Most adults prefer wine with their meal whilst the children prefered Coke. If children stayed in to watch{television they would probably look for a comedy or a lifelike programme like Eastenders, but adults would look for plays or soap operas like Dynasty. That is our Life style in Strensall.
